query.sql: select child.owner, 'SQLDEV:LINK:'||child.owner||':TABLE:'||child.table_name||':oracle.dbtools.raptor.controls.grid.DefaultDrillLink' as child_table, listagg( cols.column_name, ', ') within group ( order by cols.position) as column_list from all_constraints child inner join all_constraints par on child.r_owner = par.owner and child.r_constraint_name = par.constraint_name inner join all_cons_columns cols on child.owner = cols.owner and child.constraint_name = cols.constraint_name where par.owner = :OBJECT_OWNER and par.table_name = :OBJECT_NAME group by child.owner, child.table_name
